properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICK, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, IMG_RENAME, PROFILE_IMG FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND (IMG_LEVEL = 0 OR IMG_LEVEL IS NULL) AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY IMG_LEVEL
DELETE FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS REPLY_COUNT FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND REPLY_ST = 'N'
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ?, ?, 1, DEFAULT)
